text: {{Infobox writer | name = Robert Gover | image = | birth_date = November 2, 1929 | birth_place = Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States | death_date = January 12, 2015 (age 85) | death_place = Rehoboth Beach, Delaware, U.S. | occupation = Novelist, journalist, teacher | genre = | movement = | notableworks = One Hundred Dollar Misunderstanding | website = }} Robert Gover (November 2, 1929 â€“ January 12, 2015) was an American journalist.
